alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:57PM EDT until August 03 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Fountain County in west central Indiana... Southwestern Warren County in west central Indiana... Northwestern Vermillion County in west central Indiana... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 556 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Covington to Sidell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Foster around 600 PM EDT. Covington around 605 PM EDT. West Lebanon around 610 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Williamsport and Attica. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 1 and 9. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
